DataElement.preferredName: First Erythrocyte Count 8 For 30 Day Without Blood Transfusion Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: First date of 30 days in which the hemoglobin of a patient reaches a value of 8 grams per deciliter without the use of transfusion(s).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First Erythrocyte Count 8 For 30 Day Without Blood Transfusion Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._The determination of the number of erythrocytes in a blood sample._A number with no fractional part.::8_The reason of something._A number with no fractional part.::30_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours._Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone. (from Merriam-Webster OnLine)_The injection of whole blood or a blood component directly into the bloodstream._Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

ObjectClass.preferredName: First Erythrocyte Count Integer::8 For Integer::30 Day Recovery
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition:
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:The determination of the number of erythrocytes in a blood sample.:A number with no fractional part.::8:The reason of something.
:A number with no fractional part.::30:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:gradual healing (through rest) after sickness or injury.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
The determination of the number of erythrocytes in a biospecimen.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.

Property.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone. (from Merriam-Webster OnLine):The administration of blood or blood products into a blood vessel.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone.
The injection of whole blood or a blood component directly into the bloodstream.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated for NCI CCR Transplantation protocol
